statements: SELECT * FROM voting_records WHERE vote_result='Approved';
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, vote_result FROM voting_records WHERE vote_result='Rejected';
SELECT voter_id, vote_timestamp FROM voting_records WHERE vote_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM voting_records ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_records GROUP BY voter_id HAVING total_votes > 2;
SELECT * FROM voting_records WHERE vote_id = 100;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_records GROUP BY voter_id ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, COUNT(*) AS vote_count FROM voting_records GROUP BY candidate_id HAVING vote_count > 5;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_records GROUP BY voter_id, candidate_id;
SELECT * FROM voting_records WHERE vote_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM voting_records ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name FROM voting_records WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_records;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name, vote_timestamp FROM voting_records WHERE vote_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, creation_timestamp FROM governance_smart_contract ORDER BY creation_timestamp ASC;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name FROM voting_records WHERE vote_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT candidate_name, voter_id FROM voting_records WHERE voter_id = 1001 ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM governance_smart_contract WHERE creation_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM governance_smart_contract ORDER BY contract_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name, vote_timestamp FROM voting_records WHERE voter_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) AND candidate_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM votes WHERE voter_id = 1
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 2
SELECT candidate_name FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id = 3
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, vote_timestamp FROM votes WHERE vote_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM voters ORDER BY voter_name ASC
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, voter_address FROM voters
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 1
SELECT candidate_id, candidate_name FROM candidates ORDER BY candidate_name DESC
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM voters WHERE voter_address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT voter_name, vote_timestamp FROM voters JOIN votes ON voters.voter_id = votes.voter_id
SELECT * FROM votes;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, vote_date FROM votes WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM votes WHERE vote_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM voters WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM votes WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM voters WHERE id = 5;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE id = 3 ORDER BY candidate_name ASC;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM votes GROUP BY voter_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT contract_name, contract_owner FROM governance_smart_contract WHERE contract_owner = 'Alice' OR contract_owner = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT voter_name, vote_option FROM voters ORDER BY voter_name DESC;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM voters WHERE vote_option = 1;
SELECT candidate_name FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id = 3;
SELECT voter_id, vote_timestamp FROM votes ORDER BY vote_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM voters WHERE vote_option = 1 ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT voter_name, vote_option FROM voters WHERE voter_id > 100 ORDER BY voter_name ASC;

SELECT candidate_name, COUNT(vote_id) AS total_votes FROM candidates JOIN votes ON candidates.candidate_id = votes.candidate_id GROUP BY candidate_name HAVING total_votes > 5 ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT audit_id, action_taken, action_timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE action_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;

SELECT voter_name, candidate_name, action_description FROM voters JOIN audit_trail ON voters.voter_id = audit_trail.voter_id JOIN candidates ON audit_trail.candidate_id = candidates.candidate_id WHERE vote_option > 1 ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
